DOC.brief_title: MyNewOptions : An Online Study Reproductive Life Planning Contraceptive Action Planning
DOC.detailed_description: Most US family want 2 child , result average woman spending 3 decade life try avoid pregnancy . However , woman least one unintended pregnancy , result 1.5 million abortion 1.7 million unintended birth annually . Women couple try avoid unintended pregnancy range personal , social , economic reason , also due increase physical mental health effect child result unintended pregnancy . Healthcare reform require private health insurance company cover FDA-approved contraceptive method copays deductible patient , create great opportunity woman health insurance get contraceptive method previously could afford . In study , woman health insurance randomly assign one three group : ( 1 ) Reproductive Life Planning ( RLP ) â€”women complete reproductive life plan guide think would want future pregnancy , determine contraceptive method ( ) best suit ; ( 2 ) Reproductive Life Planning Plus ( RLP+ ) additionally include `` if-then planning , '' woman determine encounter difficult situation make difficult use contraceptive method perfectly ; ( 3 ) information-only control group . The online format study allow potential wide dissemination . The RLP RLP+ intervention expect result great likelihood contraceptive use , continuity contraceptive use , contraceptive adherence , thus reduce overall risk unintended pregnancy .
